entry.title: Today in DeFi - GammaSwap Live, Poolshark Limit Pools, Higher Savings Rate, and More...
entry.summary: GammaSwap Live GammaSwap is live on Arbitrum mainnet. Gamma is a DEX on top of Uniswap v2, allowing users to trade volatility through AMMs (i.e. short LP tokens). Traders can use Gamma to speculate on volatility or as "insurance" for their spot holdings, and MMs can use Gamma to hedge their LP position.

Raft V2 Interest Rate Vaults Live LST-backed stablecoin protocol Raft launches V2 Interest Rate Vaults, allowing users to mint the R stablecoin with LSTs as collateral ( $wstETH, $rETH, $cbETH, $swETH, and $WETH). R now offers a 6%-8% APR.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - opBNB Mainnet Live, Cosmos V12 Live, Cross-chain Farming, and More...
entry.summary: opBNB Mainnet Live opBNB mainnet is now open to the public. opBNB is an EVM-compatible L2 built on the Optimism OP Stack. There are now over 150 projects building on opBnB. Comsos V12 Live Cosmos has completed the “Gaia V12” upgrade. The upgrade introduces the liquid staking module (LSM), allowing for ATOM staked with validators to convert into liquid-staked ATOM.
